scripts.ignore:build:1: find ./dist/index.js -type f -exec sed -i -E "s/function _interopRequire/\/* istanbul ignore next *\/\nfunction _interopRequire/g" {} ;
scripts.ignore:build:2: find ./dist/index.js -type f -exec sed -i -E "s/^(.*arguments\[1\] === undefined)/\/* istanbul ignore next *\/\n\1/g" {} ;
scripts.ignore:build: npm run ignore:build:1 && npm run ignore:build:2
scripts.ignore:test: find ./dist/test.js -type f -exec sed -i "s/function _interopRequire/\/* istanbul ignore next *\/\nfunction _interopRequire/g" {} ;
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run bundle && npm run ignore:build
scripts.test: babel test.js > dist/test.js && npm run ignore:test && istanbul test ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha dist/test.js --report html -- -R spec && rm dist/test.js
scripts.coverage: babel test.js > dist/test.js && npm run ignore:test && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha dist/test.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && rm -rf ./coverage && rm dist/test.js
scripts.cov: babel test.js > dist/test.js && npm run ignore:test && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha dist/test.js -- -R spec
